hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OSNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: OS Name Version PLatform of build server

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PROJECTVERS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Project branch name or release tag

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PROJENV
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Environment variables specific to project injected by jenkins plugin

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CMD3
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Command to install the project to resolve a dependency in a batch file

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/bash if [ ! -d .autoport-scratch ]; then mkdir .autoport-scratch fi echo "*" > .autoport-scratch/.gitignore echo $META_CONTENTS > .autoport-scratch/$META_NAME env

#!/bin/bash if [ -n "$CMD1" ]; then if [ $JAVATYPE ]; then echo "Sourcing Java to $JAVATYPE" sudo chmod a+x $JAVATYPE LEN=$((${#PATH}+1)) source $JAVATYPE LAST_PATH=${PATH: $LEN} PATH=$LAST_PATH:$PATH fi if [ $JSTYPE ]; then echo "Sourcing JavaScript to $JSTYPE" sudo chmod a+x $JSTYPE LEN=$((${#PATH}+1)) source $JSTYPE LAST_NPATH=${PATH: $LEN} PATH=$LAST_NPATH:$PATH fi source /etc/profile if [ $JAVATYPE ]; then JAVA_HOME=${LAST_PATH%/bin} fi ARTI=".autoport-scratch/build_result.arti" echo "Autoport HOST: $HOSTNAME" > $ARTI echo "Autoport IPADDR: $IPADDR" >> $ARTI echo "Autoport O/S: $OSNAME" >> $ARTI echo "Autoport JAVA_HOME: $JAVA_HOME" >> $ARTI echo "Autoport NODEJS_HOME: $NODEJS_HOME" >> $ARTI echo "Autoport PATH: $PATH" >> $ARTI echo "Autoport PROJURL: $PROJECTURL" >> $ARTI echo "Autoport PROJVERS: $PROJECTVERS" >> $ARTI echo "Autoport PROJENV: $PROJENV" >> $ARTI echo "Autoport CMD: $CMD1" >> $ARTI echo "" >> $ARTI type java >> $ARTI java -version 2>> $ARTI echo "" >> $ARTI type node >> $ARTI NV=`node --version` echo "Node version: $NV" >> $ARTI echo "" >> $ARTI echo $CMD1 | tee .autoport-scratch/autoport_build_cmd; chmod a+x .autoport-scratch/autoport_build_cmd; ./.autoport-scratch/autoport_build_cmd >> $ARTI 2>&1; fi

#!/bin/bash if [ -n "$CMD2" ]; then if [ $JAVATYPE ]; then echo "Sourcing Java to $JAVATYPE" sudo chmod a+x $JAVATYPE LEN=$((${#PATH}+1)) source $JAVATYPE LAST_PATH=${PATH: $LEN} PATH=$LAST_PATH:$PATH fi if [ $JSTYPE ]; then echo "Sourcing JavaScript to $JSTYPE" sudo chmod a+x $JSTYPE LEN=$((${#PATH}+1)) source $JSTYPE LAST_NPATH=${PATH: $LEN} PATH=$LAST_NPATH:$PATH fi source /etc/profile if [ $JAVATYPE ]; then JAVA_HOME=${LAST_PATH%/bin} fi ARTI=".autoport-scratch/test_result.arti" echo "Autoport HOST: $HOSTNAME" > $ARTI echo "Autoport IPADDR: $IPADDR" >> $ARTI echo "Autoport O/S: $OSNAME" >> $ARTI echo "Autoport JAVA_HOME: $JAVA_HOME" >> $ARTI echo "Autoport NODEJS_HOME: $NODEJS_HOME" >> $ARTI echo "Autoport PATH: $PATH" >> $ARTI echo "Autoport PROJURL: $PROJECTURL" >> $ARTI echo "Autoport PROJVERS: $PROJECTVERS" >> $ARTI echo "Autoport PROJENV: $PROJENV" >> $ARTI echo "Autoport CMD: $CMD2" >> $ARTI echo "" >> $ARTI type java >> $ARTI java -version 2>> $ARTI echo "" >> $ARTI type node >> $ARTI NV=`node --version` echo "Node version: $NV" >> $ARTI echo "" >> $ARTI echo $CMD2 | tee .autoport-scratch/autoport_test_cmd; chmod a+x .autoport-scratch/autoport_test_cmd; ./.autoport-scratch/autoport_test_cmd >> $ARTI 2>&1; fi

#!/bin/bash if [ -n "$CMD3" ]; then if [ $JAVATYPE ]; then echo "Sourcing Java to $JAVATYPE" sudo chmod a+x $JAVATYPE LEN=$((${#PATH}+1)) source $JAVATYPE LAST_PATH=${PATH: $LEN} PATH=$LAST_PATH:$PATH fi if [ $JSTYPE ]; then echo "Sourcing JavaScript to $JSTYPE" sudo chmod a+x $JSTYPE LEN=$((${#PATH}+1)) source $JSTYPE LAST_NPATH=${PATH: $LEN} PATH=$LAST_NPATH:$PATH fi source /etc/profile if [ $JAVATYPE ]; then JAVA_HOME=${LAST_PATH%/bin} fi ARTI=".autoport-scratch/install_result.arti" echo "Autoport HOST: $HOSTNAME" > $ARTI echo "Autoport IPADDR: $IPADDR" >> $ARTI echo "Autoport O/S: $OSNAME" >> $ARTI echo "Autoport JAVA_HOME: $JAVA_HOME" >> $ARTI echo "Autoport NODEJS_HOME: $NODEJS_HOME" >> $ARTI echo "Autoport PATH: $PATH" >> $ARTI echo "Autoport PROJURL: $PROJECTURL" >> $ARTI echo "Autoport PROJVERS: $PROJECTVERS" >> $ARTI echo "Autoport PROJENV: $PROJENV" >> $ARTI echo "Autoport CMD: $CMD3" >> $ARTI echo "" >> $ARTI type java >> $ARTI java -version 2>> $ARTI echo "" >> $ARTI type node >> $ARTI NV=`node --version` echo "Node version: $NV" >> $ARTI echo "" >> $ARTI echo $CMD3 | tee .autoport-scratch/autoport_install_cmd; chmod a+x .autoport-scratch/autoport_install_cmd; ./.autoport-scratch/autoport_install_cmd >> $ARTI 2>&1; fi

hudson.plugins.postbuildtask.TaskPropert.script: #!/bin/bash # This script keeps the most recent KEEPBUILDS number of builds # For example, if KEEPBUILDS=75 and there are 100 builds, it will # remove the oldest 25 builds. KEEPBUILDS=125 cwd=`pwd` cd .. pwd echo "Current directory: $cwd" numBuilds=`ls -crd * | wc -l` buildsToRemove=$((numBuilds-$KEEPBUILDS)) if [ $buildsToRemove -lt 0 ]; then buildsToRemove=0 fi echo "Total number of builds: $numBuilds" echo "Number of builds to remove: $buildsToRemove" if [ $buildsToRemove -gt 0 ]; then removeList=`ls -crd * | head -n $buildsToRemove` echo "----- Start removeList ----- " for i in $removeList do ls -ld $i sudo rm -rf $i done echo "----- End removeList ----- " fi
